input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support, I am facing incorrect investment forecasts. The problem could be related to inadequate data analysis resources You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. Despite updating the software and retraining the models, the issue remains unresolved My name is John Doe.. I would be grateful if you could investigate this and offer a solution. Please inform me if you require any additional details to address this matter. Thank you for your time and support. I am looking forward to your response.
